attributes.action: Put some sport fans in stadiums
attributes.additional_details: Sports hasn't been as entertaining as it has in the past but by putting fans in the stadium, it would make it more entertaining.
attributes.background: Put sport fans in stadiums. Sticking to COVID rules, spread out the fans and were face masks entering the stadium and exiting or going to get food. When seated face masks can be taken off due to being spread out.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, the Government has announced a partial return to sporting events. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/culture-secretary-announces-return-of-fans-to-elite-sports-events-and-reopening-of-grassroots-sport-from-2-december
